entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
